description: Team marinated chicken drumsticks with corn cobs and potato wedges for a simple midweek meal where the oven does most of the work for you.
keywords: Chicken drumsticks,Nicky,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken dishes,Traybake,Weeknight dinner,Sesame free,Budget,Potato,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken bake,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Smoky Barbecue Chicken & Corn Tray Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 washed white potatoes, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230°C/210°C fan-forced. Combine sauce, paprika and garlic in a large glass bowl. Add chicken and turn to coat.

Arrange chicken, potatoes and corn on a large baking tray. Drizzle with oil and bake for 40 minutes, adding onion halfway through cooking, or until chicken is cooked and potatoes are golden. Serve topped with coriander.
